en-US.summary: Warlord Tim is your office companion
examplePhrases: Alexa ask Warlord Tim who is goofing off at work
Alexa tell Warlord Tim to fire your co-worker
Alexa ask Warlord Tim what's the status of my expense reports?
en-US.name: warlordTim
en-US.description: Warlord Tim is your go-to office companion. After the great Bohemian recession of the 1340s, Warlord Tim was forced to resign from his empire and look for gainful employment. He is ready at a moment's notice to quickly and cleanly eliminate waste in your organization. Warlord Tim has eyes and ears throughout your organization and can give you real time status updates on a variety of metrics and poor behavior. Warlord Tim is ready to get his hands dirty.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Warlord Tim should quickly and efficiently terminate unproductive employees.
